DOC.brief_summary: This study aim use Schiotz tonometer evaluate corneal biomechanical property . The administration Schiotz tonometer accord routine protocol use measure intra-ocular pressure . The result obtain Schiotz tonometer compare result obtain ORA and/or Corvis .
DOC.brief_title: A Novel Method Assess Cornea Biomechanical Properties With Schiotz Tonometer
DOC.detailed_description: Schiotz tonometer , since firstly develop 100 year ago Hjalmar Schiotz , regard classical method evaluate intraocular pressure ( IOP ) . In present study , aim measure corneal biomechanical property schiotz tonometer elucidate clinical significance novel measurement . The corneal biomechanical property calculate subtract value display load weight 5.5g load weight 7.5g . We name corneal biomechanical property obtain schiotz tonometer Mulee factor , formulation Mulee factor=value load weight 7.5g ( Value 7.5G ) -value load weight 5.5g ( Value 5.5G ) .
DOC.criteria: People without disease mention exclusion criterion part . Patients ocular disease include keratitis , conjunctivitis , history chronic eye/systemic disease except myopia keratoconus , history ocular surgery except LASIK , pregnant lactating female .
